DOC.brief_summary: This study will examine post-natal neurologic and cognitive development of infants who may have been exposed to tanezumab or comparator in-utero during the tanezumab clinical program (whether the exposure is through maternal or paternal participation in a tanezumab clinical study).
DOC.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate Infants With Potential Exposure to Tanezumab Before Birth
DOC.detailed_description: This study will enroll infants with potential tanezumab exposure in utero at sites overseen by Schulman and Associates IRB This study will attempt to enroll all infants who qualify.
DOC.criteria: Subject is an infant born to a mother who was exposed to study drug on a tanezumab clinical study through direct maternal exposure; or is an infant born to a mother who is a partner of a male patient who was exposed to study drug in a tanezumab clinical study prior to or around the time of conception and/or is exposed during his partner's pregnancy. There are no exclusion criteria for this study
